text: Jisasɨ 11.15-17 Mal 3.1-9 nudɨ kulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ kulaŋ u Jelusalem kɨlebɨla hen iakuavɨmalɨ. Iaku Jisasɨ Asɨ dɨ aŋam ulaŋ hadi agadɨ lua caba caba hen ivomalɨ. Ivo hɨdɨlɨ maka kulaŋ aŋam ulaŋ hadi agadɨ lua caba caba hen mutɨŋ salaku vihavɨdami agɨladɨdaŋ mutɨŋ lamavɨdaci lavɨkavɨdami agɨladɨdaŋ lakumalɨ. Lakudakuŋ padɨm agɨladɨ ifɨnikɨladaci fi hɨvɨ mɨgalakɨlavɨmalɨ. Padɨm hana kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ anɨm kɨlɨsɨ cavecave nulɨdɨ hɨvɨ lamavɨdami. Lamavɨdaci nulɨsaŋ hɨbɨŋ anɨm kɨlɨsɨ Asɨ dɨ aŋam ulaŋ hadi hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ iguavɨdami. Mɨgahɨnihɨni hɨsɨŋ fipɨ agɨladɨ aveji vibiŋ akɨladaci mɨgalakɨlavɨmalɨ. Mɨgahɨnihɨni hɨsɨŋ fipɨ agɨladɨ hɨvɨ ala mɨgahɨnihɨniŋ havaŋ ivɨgum agɨladɨ mutɨŋ hɨvɨ lamavɨdami.
